title: Make weak script public?
body_html:
weak_script are moved to torch/_jit_internal.py in #12723
weak_module and weak_script_method are also in that file.

Should we import these 3 functions on torch/jit/__init__.py and export the doc for these functions, so that users can use torch.jit.weak_script, torch.jit.weak_module, and torch.jit.weak_script_method to create their own weak script functions and modules?

I will write PR if this feature is approved.
body_text:
weak_script are moved to torch/_jit_internal.py in #12723
weak_module and weak_script_method are also in that file.
Should we import these 3 functions on torch/jit/__init__.py and export the doc for these functions, so that users can use torch.jit.weak_script, torch.jit.weak_module, and torch.jit.weak_script_method to create their own weak script functions and modules?
I will write PR if this feature is approved.
body:
`weak_script` are moved to `torch/_jit_internal.py` in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/12723
`weak_module` and `weak_script_method` are also in that file.

Should we import these 3 functions on `torch/jit/__init__.py` and export the doc for these functions, so that users can use `torch.jit.weak_script`, `torch.jit.weak_module`, and `torch.jit.weak_script_method` to create their own weak script functions and modules?

I will write PR if this feature is approved.
